text: Have you ever heard of a children's charity called SAVE THE CHILDREN?
Hello. yes i have heard about it
Have you ever though about  donating to said charity before?
I have donated to this charity through HITs, but never on their wesbite
I think it is amazing charity to give to and really hits home with having children myself.
I think the same. I do not have any children but I have soft heart for them
Would you be interested in donating today?
Sure , why not? I would like to know more about them

Save the Children to give girls and boys in the United States and around the world a healthy start, an education, and protection from harm.How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).
I would like to donate $1. I would like to help an international charity
That is very kind of you! Your donation will make a huge impact for them.
thank you. every little help can make a big difference actually
The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children.
That is so good. is there any big company cooperating with them?
Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
I see I mean big companies like companies with big names
None that I am aware of at this time
I think I've read somewhere IKEA and Disney cooperate with them. that is so interesting
That is very interesting! With your person donation you also helped contribute as well! It just takes one person to make a difference and I personally thank you for that!
Thanks for your time and effort. Have a nice day
